directions: Put water into a large pot; add brown sugar, pork seasoning, garlic powder, onion powder, and curing salt. Bring the mixture to a boil, reduce heat to low, and cook and stir until the seasonings are completely dissolved, 20 to 30 minutes.
Cool brine completely before adding meat.
ingredients: 1 cup pork seasoning (such as Fraboni's® Porketta®)
title: Barbeque Rib Brine
